divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my aunt were driving down to Sacremento form crescent city when about 10:00 pm we were passing threw clear lake oaks going towards Nice when i happened look arcoss towards upper lake art colony when saw an usual object hoovering over the lake me and aunt pulled the carr over and watched the object for about 11-19 mintues then it moved arcossed the lake and then it shot up into the night sky and dissapeared.
Summary: a bright flahing light green yellow red blue white it kind of hoovered for mintue then proceeded to float arcoss the lake and shoot up into the night sky and dissapear .
